Exceptional Clarity - The 24 MP triple camera lets you capture the smallest details crystal clear while the 32 MP selfie camera will intelligently recognise you to produce expert selfies.
Room for More - The massive 128 GB built-in memory means more flexibility and space for the things you love like music, photos, videos and apps.
Stunning Display - Big, bold and beautiful, the 6.15-inch FHD display with a delicate Dewdrop notch is a gorgeous canvas for you to live your life in brilliant colour.
A Battery that Goes the Distance - With HUAWEI Quick Charge, the powerful 3340 mAh charges faster and lasts longer - letting you get on with your fast-paced life and not slow down.
